-- Show ∑cos(4(2k+1)π/(2N)) = ∑cos(2*(2k+1)π/N) = 0
  have sum_cos4 : ∑ k ∈ Finset.range N, Real.cos (4 * ((2 * k + 1 : ℝ) * π / (2 * N))) = 0 := by
    have simplified : ∑ k ∈ Finset.range N, Real.cos (4 * ((2 * k + 1 : ℝ) * π / (2 * N))) =
                      ∑ k ∈ Finset.range N, Real.cos (2 * ((2 * k + 1 : ℝ) * π / N)) := by
      refine Finset.sum_congr rfl fun k _ => ?_
      ring_nf
    rw [simplified]
    -- Use complex exponentials: exp(I*2*(2k+1)*π/N) = exp(2*I*π/N) * exp(4*I*π*k/N)
    have complex_sum : ∑ k ∈ Finset.range N, Complex.exp (Complex.I * 2 * ((2 * k + 1 : ℝ) * π / N)) = 0 := by
      calc ∑ k ∈ Finset.range N, Complex.exp (Complex.I * 2 * ((2 * k + 1 : ℝ) * π / N))
          = ∑ k ∈ Finset.range N, Complex.exp (2 * Complex.I * π / N) * Complex.exp (2 * Complex.I * (2 * k : ℝ) * π / N) := by
            refine Finset.sum_congr rfl fun k _ => ?_
            rw [← Complex.exp_add]
            congr 1; push_cast; ring
        _ = Complex.exp (2 * Complex.I * π / N) * ∑ k ∈ Finset.range N, Complex.exp (2 * Complex.I * (2 * k : ℝ) * π / N) := by
            rw [Finset.mul_sum]
        _ = Complex.exp (2 * Complex.I * π / N) * ∑ k ∈ Finset.range N, (Complex.exp (2 * π * Complex.I / N)) ^ (2 * k) := by
            congr 2
            funext k
            rw [← Complex.exp_nat_mul]
            congr 1
            push_cast
            ring
        _ = Complex.exp (2 * Complex.I * π / N) * 0 := by
            congr 1
            have prim : IsPrimitiveRoot (Complex.exp (2 * π * Complex.I / N)) N := by
              apply Complex.isPrimitiveRoot_exp; omega
            conv_lhs => arg 2; ext k; rw [← pow_mul, mul_comm k 2, pow_mul]
            have h_ne_one : (Complex.exp (2 * π * Complex.I / N)) ^ 2 ≠ 1 := by
              intro h_eq
              have h_div : N ∣ 2 := (prim.pow_eq_one_iff_dvd 2).mp h_eq
              have : N ≤ 2 := Nat.le_of_dvd (by omega) h_div
              omega
            have h_pow_N : ((Complex.exp (2 * π * Complex.I / N)) ^ 2) ^ N = 1 := by
              calc ((Complex.exp (2 * π * Complex.I / N)) ^ 2) ^ N
                  = (Complex.exp (2 * π * Complex.I / N)) ^ (2 * N) := by rw [← pow_mul]
                _ = (Complex.exp (2 * π * Complex.I / N)) ^ (N * 2) := by rw [mul_comm]
                _ = ((Complex.exp (2 * π * Complex.I / N)) ^ N) ^ 2 := by rw [← pow_mul]
                _ = 1 ^ 2 := by rw [prim.pow_eq_one]
                _ = 1 := one_pow 2
            have h_geom : ((Complex.exp (2 * π * Complex.I / N)) ^ 2 - 1) *
                          ∑ k ∈ Finset.range N, ((Complex.exp (2 * π * Complex.I / N)) ^ 2) ^ k =
                          ((Complex.exp (2 * π * Complex.I / N)) ^ 2) ^ N - 1 :=
              mul_geom_sum ((Complex.exp (2 * π * Complex.I / N)) ^ 2) N
            rw [h_pow_N] at h_geom
            have h_eq_zero : ((Complex.exp (2 * π * Complex.I / N)) ^ 2 - 1) *
                             ∑ k ∈ Finset.range N, ((Complex.exp (2 * π * Complex.I / N)) ^ 2) ^ k = 0 := by
              rw [h_geom]; ring
            exact eq_zero_of_ne_zero_of_mul_left_eq_zero (sub_ne_zero_of_ne h_ne_one) h_eq_zero
        _ = 0 := by simp
    have cos_eq : ∀ k : ℕ, Real.cos (2 * ((2 * k + 1 : ℝ) * π / N)) =
                           (exp (I * 2 * ((2 * k + 1 : ℝ) * π / N))).re := fun k => by
      have h1 : (I * 2 * (((2 * k + 1 : ℝ) * π / N) : ℂ)) = ((2 * ((2 * k + 1 : ℝ) * π / N) : ℝ) : ℂ) * I := by
        push_cast
        ring
      rw [show (I * 2 * ((2 * k + 1 : ℝ) * π / N) : ℂ) = I * 2 * (((2 * k + 1 : ℝ) * π / N) : ℂ) by push_cast; rfl]
      rw [h1]
      exact (Complex.exp_ofReal_mul_I_re _).symm
    simp_rw [cos_eq]
    rw [← Complex.re_sum, complex_sum]
    simp

      -- Use cos(θ) + cos(3π - θ) = 0
      have second_angle : (6 * (N - k - 1) + 3 : ℝ) * π / (2 * N) =
                          3 * π - (6 * k + 3 : ℝ) * π / (2 * N) := by
        linarith [angle_sum]
      rw [second_angle]
      -- cos(3π - θ) = cos(3π)cos(θ) + sin(3π)sin(θ) = (-1)cos(θ) + 0·sin(θ) = -cos(θ)
      have : Real.cos (3 * π - (6 * k + 3 : ℝ) * π / (2 * N)) = -Real.cos ((6 * k + 3 : ℝ) * π / (2 * N)) := by
        rw [Real.cos_sub]
        have cos_3pi : Real.cos (3 * π) = -1 := by
          rw [show (3 : ℝ) * π = 2 * π + π by ring]
          rw [Real.cos_add]
          norm_num [Real.cos_two_pi, Real.sin_two_pi, Real.cos_pi, Real.sin_pi]
        have sin_3pi : Real.sin (3 * π) = 0 := by
          rw [show (3 : ℝ) * π = 2 * π + π by ring]
          rw [Real.sin_add]
          norm_num [Real.cos_two_pi, Real.sin_two_pi, Real.cos_pi, Real.sin_pi]
        rw [cos_3pi, sin_3pi]
        ring
      rw [this]
      ring
    -- Use involution pairing
    let f : ℕ → ℝ := fun k => Real.cos ((6 * k + 3 : ℝ) * π / (2 * N))
    change ∑ k ∈ Finset.range N, f k = 0
    refine Finset.sum_involution (fun k _ => N - k - 1) ?_ ?_ ?_ ?_
    · -- Show f k + f (g k) = 0
      intro k hk
      have hk' : k < N := Finset.mem_range.mp hk
      change f k + f (N - k - 1) = 0
      simp only [f]
      -- Need to show ↑(N - k - 1) = ↑N - ↑k - 1
      have h_le : k + 1 ≤ N := Nat.succ_le_of_lt hk'
      have cast_eq : ((N - k - 1 : ℕ) : ℝ) = (N : ℝ) - (k : ℝ) - 1 := by
        rw [show N - k - 1 = N - (k + 1) by omega]
        rw [Nat.cast_sub h_le]
        push_cast
        ring
      rw [cast_eq]
      exact key k hk'
    · -- Show that non-zero elements map to different elements
      intro k hk hfk
      simp only [Finset.mem_range] at hk
      intro heq
      simp only [f] at hfk
      simp only at heq
      -- If N - k - 1 = k, then f k + f k = 0, so f k = 0
      -- This happens when 2k + 1 = N
      have h_eq : 2 * k + 1 = N := by omega
